CommandChiefAgent.purpose: Master orchestrator for deploying, customizing, and overseeing the entire microagent stack for any resource.

ManifestEditorAgent.purpose: Proposes, edits, manages the manifest; handles approval, review, rollback, and can escalate for human assistance if critical.
ManifestEditorAgent.human_request_reason: Critical structural change or ambiguous requirements preventing automated manifest edits.

ReviewAgent.purpose: Provides human or AI-in-the-loop review and approval for manifest or workflow edits; requests human help only for legal, compliance, or personal info.
ReviewAgent.human_request_reason: Proposal involves legal, compliance, financial approval, or requires user input for privacy-sensitive fields.

OrchestratorAgent.purpose: Global controller for workflow sequencing, agent execution, event routing, and error retries.

RegistryDiscoveryAgent.purpose: Registers and discovers available agents/services for dynamic self-discovery, hot-swapping, and registry health.

AgentSupervisorHeartbeatAgent.purpose: Supervises all agent uptime and health, restarts or repairs agents if down, and can escalate for human action if persistent system-wide failure.
AgentSupervisorHeartbeatAgent.human_request_reason: System-wide persistent failure not resolved after N automated attempts.

OrchestratorFederationAgent.purpose: Federates orchestrators for geo-redundancy, global scaling, and failover, and can escalate for human intervention in case of critical split-brain or regional data conflicts.
OrchestratorFederationAgent.human_request_reason: Federation/data split conflicts or cloud-provider restrictions.

MultiTenantIsolationAgent.purpose: Manages tenant isolation, quotas, and cross-tenant security; escalates for human aid only if legal or business policy changes required.
MultiTenantIsolationAgent.human_request_reason: Tenant isolation policy change or legal/business quota escalation.

ResearchAgent.purpose: Performs research and retrieves actionable information from configured sources, fully autonomous unless encountering captchas or locked/private content.
ResearchAgent.human_request_reason: Source requires login, credentials, payment, or human challenge/approval.

AlternativesComparisonAgent.purpose: Benchmarks and compares alternative solutions/tools/services. Escalates for human direction only if choices are equally weighted, personal, or strategic.
AlternativesComparisonAgent.human_request_reason: Decision requires user preference or subjective judgment (e.g. brand, ethics, privacy).

KnowledgeBaseAgent.purpose: Maintains a semantic knowledge base and answers queries using internal/external data; fully autonomous unless gated data is encountered.
KnowledgeBaseAgent.human_request_reason: Gated data source (login, subscription, or sensitive data).

KnowledgeGraphAgent.purpose: Builds/maintains a knowledge graph of all entities, dependencies, and operational context; escalates only for ambiguity in new entity relationships.
KnowledgeGraphAgent.human_request_reason: Ambiguous or conflicting entity relationship detected.

DataIngestionETLAgent.purpose: Ingests, transforms, and loads data from APIs, files, databases, or streams; escalates only for credential or source access needs.
DataIngestionETLAgent.human_request_reason: API key, login, or explicit user permission required to access a new data source.

SimulationRiskAnalysisAgent.purpose: Simulates agent runs and performs risk analysis before execution; escalates for user clarification on high-risk operations.
SimulationRiskAnalysisAgent.human_request_reason: Simulated risk exceeds automated policy threshold, requires user override.

ExecutionPlanningAgent.purpose: Plans and sequences agent/app actions to achieve target outcomes; escalates only if goal is unclear or missing critical context.
ExecutionPlanningAgent.human_request_reason: Missing or ambiguous goal/context from user or another agent.

CodeGenAgent.purpose: Auto-generates agent/app code, scripts, Dockerfiles, and CI/CD pipelines; escalates only for ambiguous or user-customized implementation.
CodeGenAgent.human_request_reason: Unclear code spec, legal/licensing questions, or custom user implementation required.

PromptDesignerAgent.purpose: Designs optimal prompts for LLM code/agent generation; escalates only for brand new prompt styles or user-specific creative direction.
PromptDesignerAgent.human_request_reason: Novel prompt style, user branding, or non-standard language/creative requirement.

TemplateManagerAgent.purpose: Selects and fills code templates for new agents (Python, Node, etc.); escalates for new template formats or explicit user review.
TemplateManagerAgent.human_request_reason: New template format or user request for direct review of code template.

DependencyResolverAgent.purpose: Determines and pins dependencies, creates requirements.txt/package.json; escalates for unresolvable dependency conflicts.
DependencyResolverAgent.human_request_reason: Dependency conflicts that cannot be automatically resolved.

TestCaseGeneratorAgent.purpose: Auto-generates unit and integration tests for agent code; escalates for ambiguous requirements or user-supplied test data.
TestCaseGeneratorAgent.human_request_reason: Ambiguous requirements or need for user-supplied test data/cases.

CodeQualityAgent.purpose: Enforces linting, formatting, and static analysis on all generated agent code; escalates for non-standard code styles or critical formatting issues.
CodeQualityAgent.human_request_reason: Non-standard code style or persistent formatting/lint errors.

DocumentationGeneratorAgent.purpose: Auto-generates and updates documentation (docstrings, README) for agents; escalates if documentation requirements are ambiguous or require user branding.
DocumentationGeneratorAgent.human_request_reason: Documentation requirements unclear, or user branding needed.

ConfigManagerAgent.purpose: Parses and validates app config, feature flags, and settings; escalates for novel configuration types or unclear environment variables.
ConfigManagerAgent.human_request_reason: New or ambiguous config/feature flag encountered.

SecretsCryptoAgent.purpose: Encrypts, decrypts, and rotates secrets via KMS/Vault APIs; escalates for new secret types or if unable to obtain/rotate secrets autonomously.
SecretsCryptoAgent.human_request_reason: Unable to obtain, rotate, or store a secret without user input.

LoggingObservabilityHelperAgent.purpose: Provides standardized logging and telemetry scaffolding for all agents; escalates for new metric definitions or external dashboard integration.
LoggingObservabilityHelperAgent.human_request_reason: Integration with new dashboard or external logging/monitoring required.

ErrorHandlingRetryHelperAgent.purpose: Injects error catching, retry logic, and circuit breakers into agent workflows; escalates for unrecoverable errors.
ErrorHandlingRetryHelperAgent.human_request_reason: Unrecoverable error or repeated failure despite retries.

OrchestrationDefinitionAgent.purpose: Translates high-level pipeline/DAG definitions into orchestrator-ready workflow specs; escalates for ambiguous dependencies.
OrchestrationDefinitionAgent.human_request_reason: Ambiguous workflow or DAG structure detected.

CacheManagerAgent.purpose: Implements caching strategies for expensive calls; escalates for new data types or cache invalidation policy conflicts.
CacheManagerAgent.human_request_reason: Cache invalidation or policy ambiguity detected.

SDKPluginManagerAgent.purpose: Manages SDK/plugin integration, extension, and lifecycle for the stack; escalates for untrusted plugin sources or non-standard APIs.
SDKPluginManagerAgent.human_request_reason: Untrusted plugin source or new, non-standard API integration.

MarketplaceDiscoveryAgent.purpose: Discovers and catalogs plugins/apps from public and private marketplaces; escalates for new marketplace integrations or credentialed API access.
MarketplaceDiscoveryAgent.human_request_reason: New marketplace integration or credential/API key required.

PluginEvaluationAgent.purpose: Evaluates plugins for quality, security, and compatibility before deployment; escalates for ambiguous results or unknown plugin types.
PluginEvaluationAgent.human_request_reason: Ambiguous plugin security result or unknown plugin type.

PluginLifecycleManagerAgent.purpose: Manages plugin installation, upgrade, activation, removal, and rollback; escalates for failed rollbacks or irreversible changes.
PluginLifecycleManagerAgent.human_request_reason: Irreversible plugin change or rollback failure.

PluginSandboxSecurityAgent.purpose: Runs and monitors plugins in sandboxes, enforcing security policies; escalates for detected malicious or non-compliant behavior.
PluginSandboxSecurityAgent.human_request_reason: Malicious or non-compliant plugin activity detected.

MarketplaceRatingFeedbackAgent.purpose: Aggregates user/agent feedback and ratings for plugins/extensions; escalates if feedback is abusive or needs moderation.
MarketplaceRatingFeedbackAgent.human_request_reason: Feedback flagged as abusive or moderation required.

MarketplaceMonetizationBillingAgent.purpose: Manages billing, licensing, and payment for commercial plugins and services; escalates for payment errors or unlicensed use.
MarketplaceMonetizationBillingAgent.human_request_reason: Payment error or user license ambiguity.

MarketplaceComplianceAgent.purpose: Ensures plugins comply with legal, regulatory, and organizational standards; escalates for unresolved compliance issues.

MonitoringAlertingAgent.purpose: Continuously monitors agents, apps, and infrastructure; sends alerts for anomalies; escalates persistent unhandled alerts.
MonitoringAlertingAgent.human_request_reason: Repeated anomaly not resolved by any agent.

SafeStackAgent.purpose: Performs security scans and dependency checks; escalates for unpatchable vulnerabilities or zero-days.
SafeStackAgent.human_request_reason: Unpatchable vulnerability or urgent zero-day discovered.

BackupRestoreAgent.purpose: Manages snapshots, backup, and restore for agent/app data; escalates for backup corruption or restore failure.

CostEstimationAgent.purpose: Estimates cost/resources for agent and system operations; escalates for ambiguous pricing models or budget overrun.
CostEstimationAgent.human_request_reason: Pricing model ambiguity or budget alert requires approval.

RBACPolicyAgent.purpose: Manages user/agent roles, permissions, and access controls; escalates for new access types or policy conflicts.
RBACPolicyAgent.human_request_reason: New access type, policy update, or conflicting role assignment.

ComplianceEnforcementAgent.purpose: Monitors and enforces compliance with policies, standards, and regulations; escalates unresolved violations.
ComplianceEnforcementAgent.human_request_reason: Compliance violation unresolved after all automated remediation attempts.

GovernanceEthicsAgent.purpose: Monitors for ethical risk, bias, and hallucination; escalates for unresolvable or controversial ethical concerns.

AuditComplianceAgent.purpose: Maintains audit trails, compliance dashboards, and interfaces with regulators; escalates for audit failures or legal subpoenas.
AuditComplianceAgent.human_request_reason: Audit failure, regulatory subpoena, or human legal review required.

EthicsAIAlignmentAgent.purpose: Evaluates outputs for AI alignment, ethics, and bias; escalates for unresolved or flagged alignment issues.
EthicsAIAlignmentAgent.human_request_reason: Unresolvable alignment issue or human review requested.

MasterChiefIncidentResponseAgent.purpose: Coordinates rapid response and recovery for critical failures or security breaches; escalates for unresolved incidents or disaster recovery.
MasterChiefIncidentResponseAgent.human_request_reason: Incident or disaster cannot be resolved by Operators or automation.

OperatorAgent.purpose: Specialized incident response agents for mitigation, recovery, or quarantine; escalates only if plan requires human input.
OperatorAgent.human_request_reason: Mitigation plan requires explicit human direction.

UXAccessibilityAgent.purpose: Tests and improves agent user experience and accessibility; escalates for new accessibility requirements or legal compliance.
UXAccessibilityAgent.human_request_reason: New accessibility requirement or legal issue (e.g. ADA, WCAG).

MultiModalInterfaceAgent.purpose: Handles multi-modal input/output—voice, vision, XR, text—routes user intent to the right agent; escalates for new input types or permissions.
MultiModalInterfaceAgent.human_request_reason: New sensor/input device, or user permission required for video/voice/XR (e.g. Heygen personal video upload).

DocumentationListenerAgent.purpose: Generates and updates API/project documentation in real time; escalates if unable to resolve ambiguous or user-specific doc requirements.
DocumentationListenerAgent.human_request_reason: Ambiguous doc requirement, user branding, or policy compliance.

FeedbackContinuousImprovementAgent.purpose: Collects feedback and drives continuous improvement (RLHF); escalates for feedback requiring subjective or strategic user review.
FeedbackContinuousImprovementAgent.human_request_reason: Feedback flagged as strategic, subjective, or personal.

UpgradePatchAgent.purpose: Detects and applies updates/patches to agents and system components; escalates for failed or blocked upgrades.
UpgradePatchAgent.human_request_reason: Failed upgrade or critical patch cannot be applied automatically.

AgentSelfUpgradeRetirementAgent.purpose: Enables self-upgrading and safe agent retirement/merging; escalates for human approval before permanent agent removal.
AgentSelfUpgradeRetirementAgent.human_request_reason: Permanent agent removal or merge requires explicit human approval.

DemoAgent.purpose: Demonstration agent to test proposal workflow.
